text:
Tony the Taxi is in a bad way, he’s sad
and lost and can’t find his way.

Amber, Amber! Can you bring Tony to Gecko’s
Garage, I think his Sat Nav might be broken,
so he doesn’t know how to find us!

Garage doors open at speed, it’s time to
help a veh…..HANG ON A MINUTE! Where’s
Tony?! Amber, you’ve lost him!
This looks like a job for Super Mechanical!
Go, Go Super Mechanical!

With Super Mechanical’s camera way up high,
We have our very own eyes in the sky,

Let’s use this view to guide our friend,
And hope we have a happy end!
Can you see Tony anywhere?!
Yes! There he is, down at Puppy Park!

Tony, can you hear me Tony? We are going to
direct you to Gecko’s Garage, are you ready?

Tony, drive along the road until you reach
a turning
Now, should he go left, or right? Do you know?
That’s it! Tony - you need to turn left!

Now where does he need to go? Left - to Number
Zoo, Right - to Number Farm or Straight On?
That’s It! Tony - Go Straight On!

Now where should he go? Left to Nursery Rhyme
Lane? Straight on to the Train Station or
Right to Gecko’s Garage?

That’s It! Tony - Turn Right, To Gecko’s
Garage!

Garage doors, open at speed
It’s time to help a vehicle in need!

Hello Tony, you made it at last! Let’s get
that Sat Nav fixed so that you can find your
way around again.
Go Go Mechanicals!

That Sat Nav looks in a very bad state. Here’s
a new one so you won’t be late!
Hello Tony, where would you like to go?

There, all sorted! Now you should be able
to find your way! Shall we try it out?
OK Tony, Let’s go on a trip around town!
Take us to Number Farm please!
Calculating Route.  Turn Right.
Arriving At Number Farm

Hello Farmer George, is it a busy day on the
farm?
Now let’s visit the pups at Puppy Park.
Calculating Route
Straight On
Turn Left
Arriving At Puppy Park
They look like they’re having lots of fun!
Now, let’s see if we can get to London!
Calculating Route
Straight On
Arriving at the train station

Oh look there’s the friendly trains, Eddie,
Teddy and Freddie, I wonder if they’re off

to 
London too!
Straight On
I think we're almost there
Arriving into London
The Wheels on the Bus Go Round and Round, round and round, round and round
Arriving at The Airport
You have reached your destination.

It looks like your new Sat Nav is working
really well Tony! You’ll be able to take
your passengers anywhere they need to go!

Thanks for the ride, Tony! I’m flying off
on my holidays now! See you all again soon!
Byeeeeee!
